Class SystemConfiguration.EFapsPBEConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.admin.common.SystemConfiguration.EFapsPBEConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jasypt.encryption.pbe.config.PBEConfig, org.jasypt.encryption.pbe.config.StringPBEConfig
    Enclosing class:
    SystemConfiguration

    public static final class SystemConfiguration.EFapsPBEConfig
extends Object
implements org.jasypt.encryption.pbe.config.StringPBEConfig
    Configuration class. Currently only the password is used. For all other nullis returnred to use the default values from jasyprt.
